All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BBQChicken
BBQChicken pizza subclass, a speciality pizza with present toppings
BuildYourOwn
BuildYourOwn pizza subclass, allows customization of toppings
CartActivity
CartActivity manages the shopping cart screen.
CartAdapter
Adapter for displaying cart items in the RecyclerView.
CartAdapter.CartViewHolder
ViewHolder for each pizza item in the RecyclerView.
CartAdapter.OnPizzaRemoveListener
Interface to handle pizza removal event from the cart.
ChicagoPizza
Chicago factory class, implements the PizzaFactory interface to produce different types of pizzas.
ChicagoPizzaActivity
Activity for customizing and ordering Chicago-style pizzas.
Crust
Enum class representing the different types of crusts available for pizzas.
Deluxe
Deluxe pizza subclass, a speciality pizza with present toppings
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
MainActivity
The MainActivity class is the entry point for RU Pizzeria applications.
Meatzza
Meatzza pizza subclass, a speciality pizza with present toppings
NewYorkPizzaActivity
This class manages New York Activity, the user interface for selecting different types of pizzas, sizes, and toppings in the Chicago-style pizza menu.
NYPizza
NYPizza factory class, implements the PizzaFactory interface to produce different types of pizzas.
Order
Order class contains unique order number and keeps the list of instances of Pizza class.
OrderActivity
The OrderActivity class manages the display and interaction with a list of customer orders.
OrderItemDetailsAdapter
Adapter for displaying pizza details in an order.
OrderItemDetailsAdapter.PizzaItemsViewHolder
ViewHolder for Pizza items in the RecyclerView.
OrderListAdapter
Adapter class for displaying each order item in a ListView.
OrderListAdapter.OnOrderClickListener
Interface for handling "View Order" button clicks.
Pizza
Abstract class representing a Pizza with crust, size, and toppings.
PizzaFactory
Interface for creating different types of pizzas.
ShareResource
Singleton class to manage shared resources across activities.
Size
Enum class representing the different sizes available for pizzas.
SplashActivity
 
Topping
Enum class representing the different types of toppings available for pizzas.
